genericContent.itemName: RCA 42" LED 1080p 60Hz, LED42A45RQ, RCA Home Theater System, 6ft HDMI Cable, TV Bundle
genericContent.shortDescription: Enjoy watching movies and your favorite shows in high-definition with the RCA 42" LED HDTV. This widescreen LED 1080p 60Hz HDTV uses LED backlit technology to produce images with extremely vivid colors. The brilliant 1080p full HD resolution gives you a sharp picture. A wide 42-inch screen and broad 168-degree vertical and horizontal angles allow you to view the pictures from anywhere in the room with absolute clarity. This 2.0" Ultra-Slim HDTV LED42A45RQ is wall mountable and comes with three HDMI inputs. The RCA 42" LED HDTV also comes with an Energy Star certification that marks its energy saving capacity and eco-friendliness.
genericContent.longDescription:
RCA LED42A45RQ 42" 1080p LED LCD HDTV:

  • 42" LED panel - With a 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution
  • True 16:9 aspect ratio - View your movies as the director intended
  • Wide 168-degree vertical and 168-degree horizontal angles - See a clear picture from anywhere in the room
  • This 1080p 60Hz HDTV features a built-in digital tuner - Watch digital broadcasts, including HDTV programs where available
  • High brightness of 450 cd/m2 and 4 ms response time - Quick response time for a great picture
  • 4,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio
  • HDMI Inputs: 4 - Enjoy a superior HD experience with HDMI one cable solution
  • 42" screen measured diagonally from corner to corner
  • Wall mountable - VESA standard mounting
genericContent.shelfDescription: <li>42" diagonal screen size<li>HDMI Inputs: 4<li>Wall mountable<li>Built-in digital tuner
